programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Dirou Niya
programme.desc: The comedy takes place at a working-class cafe located in the heart of a neighborhood, where the characters are passionate about by football, and it's always the talk of the hour, especially with the presence of Mahmoud and Al Kushi, two ex-footballers fighting over glory.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Portreh
programme.desc: On the recommendation of his father's former sweetheart, Hazem becomes the editor-in-chief of an economic magazine. As he falls in love with Rima, the niece of his father's ex, trouble soon follows since an old feud has Hazem's parents and Rima at odds over the history with Randa.

programme.title: Eursan akhar zman
programme.desc: In each episode of the series, a groom proposes to marry Hikmat, the beautiful, educated young woman, who holds a doctorate in pharmacy and owns a pharmacy in the capital. As she comes from a well-off family, she is not in a hurry to choose a suitor from among the many men who ask for her hand.

programme.title: Return My Morning
programme.desc: Love brings together a successful man, Nabil, who has been searching for love a lot, and Raneem. Throughout the series, we see their extremely romantic story and also monitor their attitudes and interactions with their social surroundings.

programme.title: Al-Zahir Baibars
programme.desc: The life and exploits of al-Zahir Baibars, Sultan of Egypt and the Levant, his journey from being a slave to Prince Ala’ al-Din al-Bunduqari, until he became sultan, and the many important events he was involved in, like the fall of Baghdad at the hands of Mongol commander Hulagu Khan, and the battle of Ain Jalut.

programme.title: Torjoman El-Ashwak
programme.desc: The show tells the story of three friends who decide to adopt the left-wing ideology. After each goes their way, one of them starts taking up Sufism and one maintains his leftist principles, which gets him into a lot of trouble. The third one decides to leave Syria, but returns after the civil war to find his missing daughter.

programme.desc: In the wake of a fight that left half the members of Ghefran and Assaf's families dead, the latter is released from prison to try and restore the balance of power between him and his archenemy Gherfan, especially as the latter had married Assaf's beloved ex-wife and raised his son.

programme.title: Without Restraint (Ep6)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance 2021 Ghazal is trapped in an unwanted marriage to a controlling businessman due to his power and her family's passiveness. However, everything changes when her heart and Seif El Khedewy's heart are united by fearless love. Yasmin Abd Al Aziz, Ahmed Al Awady, Khaled Al Sawy, Dina Fouaad, Khaled Sarhan, Amr Mahmoud Yasin, Mustafa Fikry

programme.title: Souq Al-Harir
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the period between 1950 and 1960 in Syria, with a focus on certain social stories, including that of Gharib who lost his memory as a child and is trying to find his way back to his family, and Omran who is a polygamist merchant living with his mother.

programme.title: Margaret (Ep11)
programme.desc: Drama, People 2021 A British woman of Arab origins lives in the Gulf society and many situations happen to her because of some Arab behaviors. Hayat Al Fahed , Hassan Al Balam, Soaad Ali, Hamad AlOmani, Heba Aldurri, Basel Al Khatib, Muhammad Shams

programme.title: Be My Sunshine
programme.desc: On Swallow Island, the paths of businesswoman Haziran and gorgeous young man Poyraz collide, and love blossoms as a result of their conflicting personalities.

programme.title: Closer Than The Soul (Ep21)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2019 After gathering, friendship and affection between four families, the differences now are dividing them. Hussein Al Mansour, Bassema Hamada, Mashary Al Balam, Mahmoud Boushahri, Abdul Rahman Al Salman, Al Hanouf

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep74)
programme.desc: Bollywood, Romance, Drama 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Elle Maloush Kbeer
programme.desc: As Ghazal's father forces her to marry a wealthy businessman despite the big age difference between them, the circumstances force her to toughen up in order to deal with those around her, as she gets to know the young man Seif El Khedewy and falls for him.

programme.title: Progeny Of Al Aghrab (Ep6)
programme.desc: Drama, Thriller, People 2021 Presenting the story of a man from upper Egypt who is accused of murder; after spending jail time, he returns to revenge from his worst enemies. Amir Karara, Ahmed El Sakka, Mai Omar, Ahmed Malek, Ahmad Dash, Mohamed Samy, Mohamed Samy

programme.title: Margaret
programme.desc: A British woman marries a Khaleeji and lives in Arab society. After her husband's death, she becomes responsible for her family, as her life intertwines with the lives of those around her, and many clashes occur due to her unfamiliarity with some Arab traditions.

programme.title: Silk Market (Ep8)
programme.desc: Drama 2021 After one of Imran's children is kidnapped by a stranger, problems increase and cause the family to mourn. Bassam Kousa, Salom Hdad, Nadine Tahseeine bek, Fadi Sobeih, Al Mathna Sobh, Saif Reda Hamid

programme.title: Minny We Finy
programme.desc: A drama series that monitors a range of social issues, between three families, Mashal, Mohamed and Sa'd who have a strong neighborly relationship, despite their different culture and social classes.

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep60)
programme.desc: Romance, Comedy 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. Without knowing, she ruins his work. Ayca Aysin Turan, Alp Navruz, Nihan Büyükagaç, Ipek Tenolcay, Bülent Çolak, Ali Bilgin, Özgür Sevimli, Aksel Bonfil, Yesim Citak, Yelda Eroglu, Dilek Iyigün, Emine Yildirim

programme.title: 30 Youm
programme.desc: Tarek Helmy is a young married psychiatrist who has a daughter named Farida. On her first birthday, a patient called Tawfiq Al-Masry comes to Tarek, explaining to him an experiment he wants to carry out: he will pick someone, "The Chosen", and put him through a cycle of self-destructive crises over thirty days.

programme.title: Al-Heiba
programme.desc: Alia lives with her husband and their son in a European country. When the husband dies, she returns to Lebanon to bury him, only to discover that his family wants to take her son away, unless she marries his brother Jabal. She also discovers that her husband's family are arms smugglers.

programme.title: Flight of Dreams
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab, however, as the family dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Bab Al-Reih
programme.desc: Addressing the issue of the widespread violence that has taken over society, the series tells the story of a mailman who struggles with the fact that written mail is no longer being used, as he balances his professional struggles with the love he has for his family, especially his blind daughter.

programme.title: Bayn qalbayn
programme.desc: A romantic social drama that deals with the love story of the girl Ariam, who defended her love against the tough conditions she's living in at the time. She fell in love with Bashar despite being married to another.

programme.title: Nasibi Wa Qesmetik
programme.desc: Connected but separate episodes dealing with 15 different topics, divided into 3 episodes each topic, discussing the relationship between men and women, the problems that occur between them, and how they can be overcome.

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1979

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1978
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Larry Grayson first shouted "Shut that door!" on The Generation Game, and Ted Rogers rolled out his robotic dustbin on 3-2-1.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Demis Roussos soundtracked Abigail's Party. Punk was the new scourge of society, but it was outsold by TV cop crooner David Soul!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1976
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Concorde, the Bionic Woman, The Honey Monster and Rentaghost all launched! And it was one of the hottest summers on record.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Margaret Thatcher became Tory leader, Ding-a-Dong won Eurovision, and Fawlty Towers opened its doors for the very first time!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1973
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year the UK entered Europe, Led Zeppelin conquered America, and Wimbledon Common said hello to The Wombles!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from a year of major cultural debuts - Jesus Christ Superstar, Are You Being Served? and George, Zippy & Bungle in Rainbow!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Gary Barlow, David Tennant and Clare Balding were born. And the UK said goodbye to pounds, shillings & pence as we went decimal!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1970
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines from a year of firsts - 18 year olds were allowed to vote in the UK, Hawaii Five-O arrived on the TV & the 747 Jumbo launched from Heathrow!

programme.desc: Mae Breian yn enwog drwy'r harbwr am ei frolio. Tybed am beth mae'n brolio heddiw? Breian is known throughout the harbour for his boasting abilities. What is he boasting about today?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Brown, y chwilotwr lliw, yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Colour explorer Brown arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae hi mor niwlog, mae Crëyr yn cael trafferth cludo pecyn o gacennau i Llwyd ac mae pethau'n mynd o ddrwg i waeth. Crëyr struggles to deliver her cake package to Llwyd in deep fog.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd goleudy Ocido'n torri, mae Blero, Dylan, Sïan a Swn yn mynd ar daith beryglus i Fynydd Dirgel i chwilio am y golau nad yw byth yn diffodd. The Ocido lighthouse breaks down, oh no!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn cwrdd a theulu sy'n mwynhau dringo, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Bro Teyrnon yn gwneud ioga. Today: Meleri will be cycling with Elis on the pump track, plus more.

programme.title: Agor y Clo
programme.desc: Rhaglen gynta' cyfres newydd sy'n agor y clo ar yr hanesion teuluol tu ôl i'r creiriau yn ein cartrefi a'n cymunedau. New series: Vintage cars, international rugby shirts and a tiny diary.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Gwyrdd yn cynnal sioe hud i gyflwyo ei ffrindiau newydd, Du a Gwyn. Green stages a magic show to introduce her new friends Black and White.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn penderfynu cadw'n heini er mwyn ennill ras yn erbyn y gwencwn. Crawc resolves to keep fit in order to win the racing challenge thrown down by the weasels.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Maer Oci yn enwi trên newydd ar ôl ei fam, Gloria, ond pan fydd dail yn disgyn ar y cledrau mae pethau'n mynd o chwith! Maer Oci names a new train after his mother, but problems arise!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Ymunwch gyda Meleri a Huw wrth iddyn nhw grwydro Cymru a chael pob math o antur yn yr awyr agored. Today: a wet and muddy assault course, skateboarding, and the world's fastest zip line.

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: New: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae cynlluniau Lloyd gydag Abacus yn cael eu difetha pan mae rhaid iddo fynd ar daith i Caterpillar World. Lloyd's plans with Abacus are ruined when he goes on a trip to Caterpillar World.

programme.title: MabinOgi-Ogi a Mwy!
programme.desc: Fersiwn bywiog criw Stwnsh o stori Rhys a Meinir. Yr wythnos hon mi fydd yna ymweliad arbennig gan dîm Priodas Pum Mil! Join the Stwnsh team for their take on the story of Rhys a Meinir.

programme.title: New: Boom!
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, bydd y brodyr Bidder yn hedfan ar wifren zip i brofi theorïau Newton a Galileo, a bydd Aled yn dangos sut i greu negeseuon cudd. This time, the Bidder brothers fly on a zipline.

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
programme.desc: Teithia Sue ac Emrys i Abu Dhabi i weld Rod y mab wrth ei waith i'r teulu brenhinol ar yr ynys breifat. Sue and Emrys' son competes in a show with over £10m dirhams prize money up for grabs.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Final weekend of the JD Cymru Premier first phase - there's a three horse race between Caernarfon Town, Pen-y-bont and Haverfordwest County.
